source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_00<tab>Jacke wears an expression of mild concern.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_00<tab>ナマイ村のジャックは、退屈そうにしている。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_01<tab>Oboro has returned from the village, but to hear Jacke tell it, the young shinobi is not quite himself. Suspecting that he might have wandered off to a nearby waterfall to clear his head─as is his wont─the two of you head off in pursuit.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_01<tab>ジャックによると、オボロが戻ってきたが、悩んだ様子でどこかへ行ってしまったという。ヤンサのアオサギ滝で「オボロ」を探そう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_02<tab>You and Jacke come upon Oboro under the falling waters of the Heron's Flight. As he dries himself off by the fire, the ninja shares with you just what has been troubling him so. As he tells it, he was given a hero's welcome upon his return to the village, but recent events have left him unable to accept the praise lavished upon him. Jacke comforts him with a tale of your own adventures, the moral of which is that when people give you more credit than you deserve, you might as well take it as an opportunity to better yourself rather than beating yourself up for your perceived failings. With newfound resolve, Oboro declares his intention to learn the secret history of Sasuke, his village's founder, from the old hermit known as Master Kamui. Return to Namai, where Tsubame has prepared a most majestic means of transportation for your journey.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_02<tab>オボロを見つけた。彼は忍びの里に戻り、カラスを討った者と称えられたことが、居心地が悪かったという。忍びの里の開祖「サスケ」の密命について調べるため、最長老のカムイを訪ねることになった。ナマイ村の「オボロ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_03<tab>Oboro explains that Master Kamui has sequestered himself in meditation in Plum Spring, a short flight away from where you stand. When you are ready, mount the great falcon whose wings will carry you to your destination.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_03<tab>オボロと話して、梅泉郷へ向かった。ヤンサの梅泉郷にいる「オボロ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_04<tab>Despite the troubles you took in seeking him out, Master Kamui is not keen to engage you in conversation, instead demanding that Oboro fetch him three ingredients to brew a medicine to cure his aching back. Though the old hermit seems quite comfortable in the company of Tsubame, it would appear you and your friends have little choice but to do his bidding.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_04<tab>オボロと話した。カムイは腰が痛いらしく、生薬を集めることになった。ナマイ村の「オボロ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_05<tab>Back in Namai, you, Oboro, and Jacke resolve to split up and quickly dispense with the old hermit's busywork. Fetch a claw from the Doman weasels that prowl the Glittering Basin, while your friends see to the other items on Master Kamui's shopping list.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_05<tab>オボロから、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DCE01 /var>を獲ってくるよう頼まれた。ヤンサの無二江流域にいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2167E01 /var>」を討伐し「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DCE01 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_06<tab>After a hard-fought battle with the slavering beast, the weasel claw is yours. Return to Namai, and hope that your friends have found similar success in their hunts.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_06<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DCE01 /var>を入手した。ナマイ村の「オボロ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DCE01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_07<tab>You return to Namai, and are pleased to see that Oboro and Jacke have also managed to procure the rare ingredients sought by Master Kamui. Hoping that this will suffice to convince the old hermit to share his knowledge with you, you set out once again for Plum Spring on the wings of the great bird.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_07<tab>オボロに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DCE01 /var>を渡し、梅泉郷へ向かった。梅泉郷の「オボロ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_08<tab>You return to Plum Spring to find Master Kamui in fine fettle, some time in the company of the lovely Tsubame having clearly done the work of the most potent of elixirs. His spirits high, he regales you with the true story of Master Sasuke, he who brought ninjutsu to Doma and founded the village Oboro and his fellow shinobi call home. Long ago, Sasuke sailed across the Ruby Sea to Doma at the bidding of his master, Hanzo the First. Hanzo entrusted his young protégé with a scroll writ with the forbidden mudra of summoning he had devised, commanding him to use it to free the Doman people from tyranny. Sasuke did just that, and then─fearing the mudra's power─cleaved the scroll in two, that the fearsome knowledge contained within never again would see the light of day. At the same time, he founded a village, that he might train his new countrymen in the art of ninjutsu, and pass his legacy on to future generations. Sadly, as his mission─even at the time─was shrouded in the utmost of secrecy, Sasuke's heroic deeds on behalf of Doma never reached the ears of his clansmen, and centuries later, it would seem that the descendants of the Kagekakushi clan have come to see him as a traitor and deserter who stole away to a foreign land with his master's forbidden knowledge. As Oboro puts the pieces together, Princess Yuki and Jacke arrive bearing grave news. The Kagekakushi clan means to sail for Doma to claim what they believe is rightly theirs─and when they come, they will come with an army.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_08<tab>オボロと話した。カムイによると、サスケの密命はひんがしの国からドマへ渡り、「禁忌口寄せの術」を使い、ドマの民を救うことだったという。そこへ、ユキが影隠一族が動き始めたと報せにきた。ナマイ村の「オボロ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_09With clouds of war brewing on the horizon, you return to Namai with Oboro, knowing that it is but a matter of time before Hanzo and the Kagekakushi army arrives on Doman shores. You resolve to devote all your efforts to your training, knowing that you and your friends will be tested as never before.

※The next ninja quest will be available from Oboro upon reaching level 70.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SEQ_09オボロと話した。影隠一族との戦いに向けて、修行を積んでおこう。

※忍者のレベルが70以上になると、ナマイ村のオボロから次の忍者クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TODO_00<tab>Look for Oboro at the Heron's Flight.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TODO_00<tab>アオサギ滝でオボロを探す

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Oboro at Namai.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TODO_01<tab>ナマイ村のオボロと話す

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Oboro at Plum Spring.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TODO_02<tab>梅泉郷のオボロと話す

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Oboro at Namai.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TODO_03<tab>ナマイ村のオボロと話す

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TODO_04<tab>Obtain a Doman weasel claw from a Doman weasel.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TODO_04<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2167E01 /var>から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DCE01 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the Doman weasel claw to Oboro in Namai.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TODO_05<tab>ナマイ村のオボロに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DCE01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Oboro got back not long ago. Mumbled somethin' about his trip to the village was uneventful, then dragged his beater cases off somewhere or 'nother, lookin' at the ground all the while.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_000よう、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
ついさっき、オボロが忍びの里から戻ってきたぞ。
今のところ里に異変はなく、平穏そのものなんだとさ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_001<tab>Jacke knows how to read a cove, and somethin' tells me the boy ain't right these days─like he's carryin' the weight o' the world on his shoulders.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_001だが、あいつは何やら悩んでいる様子で、
フラフラと、どこかへ行っちまったんだ。
そりゃもう、いつにも増して薄幸顔だったぜ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_002<tab>You know the lad better than anyone. You reckon there's somewhere he'd run off to if he were lookin' to clear his head?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_002付き合いの長いお前なら、オボロが悩んだとき、
どういう場所へ行くか、見当がついたりしないか……？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_Q1_000_003<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_Q1_000_003<tab>オボロが行きそうな場所は？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_A1_000_004<tab>Mayhap he returned to his village?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_A1_000_004<tab>忍びの里

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_A2_000_005<tab>His hideout in Eorzea, no doubt.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_A2_000_005<tab>船着場の平屋

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_A3_000_006<tab>Is there a waterfall in these parts, by chance?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_A3_000_006<tab>滝

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_007<tab>Ye sure about that? He was lookin' more to me like someone who wanted to be alone. Ye don't reckon there's anywhere else the lad might go?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_007いや、ひとりになりたそうだったから、それはないだろう。
ひとけのない場所じゃないか……？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_008<tab>Yer tellin' me he just up and hopped the twig back to Eorzea without so much as a whid? Not bloody likely. There must be somewhere else he might be...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_008おいおい、ラノシアまで戻ったってのか？
それはないな、もっと近辺だろう……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_009<tab>A waterfall? Now that ye mention it, I did hear the sound of runnin' water when I went on a stroll the other day.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_009そうか……。
この近辺で滝といえば、用水池から流れる滝があったな……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_010<tab>I'm not quite sure I whiddle ye, but if that's where ye think the lad is, like as not yer right. Let's go see if we can't ease his cares a bit.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_010それじゃ、一緒に滝の辺りでオボロを探して、
あいつの悩みでも聞いてやるとするか……。
まったく、世話の焼ける薄幸顔だぜ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_015<tab>Is that...Oboro? Bugger me, the lad <var 1A 02 /var>has<var 1A 01 /var> lost his bloody mind!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_015おい、あれオボロだよな……？
何やってんだ……あいつ？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_020<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I had hoped to spend some more time alone with my thoughts, but it is just as well. It grows cold, and I would warm myself by a fire.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_020)) (( )) 02 /var>か……？
は、話は……場所を変えてからにしよう。
か、身体が冷えてしまったので……た、焚火にあたりたい……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_021<tab>You know me all too well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I suppose I should not be surprised.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_021よくあそこにいるのがわかったものだ。
もっとも、)) (( )) 02 /var>にはお見通しか。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_022<tab>Well, ye shocked the livin' wits out of me! I was expectin' to find ye in <var 1A 02 /var>front<var 1A 01 /var> of the waterfall, not <var 1A 02 /var>in<var 1A 01 /var> it!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_022<tab>滝にいるって聞いてたが、まさか、滝の中とはね……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_023<tab>At first I did just that, Captain Jacke. But when listening to the flowing water did not calm my heart as I hoped, I took the next logical course of action.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_023心を静めようと、流れる滝の音を聴いていたら、
それだけでは飽き足らず、滝に打たれたくなってな……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_024<tab>I cannot explain it. I returned to my village, fully expecting to be punished for my deception and chastised for my failure to perform my duty. Instead, I was greeted as a hero─the honorable shinobi who slew the villainous Karasu, traitor to our village and country.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_024それというのも、久々の里帰りとなり、
里を欺いたことで、罰せられると覚悟していたのだが……。
裏切り者のカラスを討った者として、称えられてしまったのだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_025<tab>But it is all a lie! Master Gekkai was the traitor, and were it not for Karasu─putting aside the foul deeds he performed in service to his final master─my eyes would have been forever blind to the truth!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_025真相は、我が師匠であるゲッカイこそが裏切り者で、
カラスのおかげで、里の復讐を遂げることができたというのにな。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_026<tab>That day, I promised Karasu that I would keep the truth hidden, and claim the glory and accolades in his stead. At the time, I thought nothing of it.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_026私はカラスと、その真相を隠して、
里の優等生として出世することを約束した。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_027<tab>But...it is just too much! Perhaps the man deserved to die for his sins─it is not for me to judge. But does he deserve to go to the grave as a hated villain, while I reap the fruits of deeds I can scarcely call my own!?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_027しかし、それが居心地が悪くて仕方がなかった。
あいつが、ハンゾウに殺されたのは自業自得だが、
どうしても、死んだカラスに負い目を感じてしまうのだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_028<tab>Ye really are too serious for yer own good, lad. Let ol' Jacke tell ye a story.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_028やれやれ、相変わらずクソまじめだな、お前は……。
ひとつ、いい話を聞かせてやろう……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_029<tab>Once upon a time─well, maybe not so long ago─there was a dimber mort by the name of Milala, a captain o' the Yellowjackets who was always more style than substance, if ye whiddle me. Long story short, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and me did ourselves a good deed, but the lass took the credit for 'erself.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_029ミリララという、イエロージャケットの派手な女がいるんだがな。
その女は俺たちと、この)) (( )) 02 /var>でとった手柄を、
自分のものとして受け入れることを選んだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_030<tab>Did a part of me resent it? Sure, I've got feelings as any other cove. But people in our business─includin' this Karasu rook, I reckon─need people like her. People to stand in the lightmans and claim the glory, while we ply our trade in the dark.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_030双剣士はあくまで裏の存在だから、目立っちゃいけねぇ。
俺たちとしては、そんなミリララみたいな存在も必要なんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_031<tab>Milala might not have done the deed, but since then, they say she's a new woman─doin' all she can to be the hero that people believe 'er to be.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_031ミリララもミリララで、思いがけぬ手柄をいただいたことで、
それに見合う者になろうと必死になってるようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_032<tab>In not so many whids, I guess what I'm sayin' is─rather than cloutin' yerself in the nob about glory ye feel ye don't deserve, why not try live up to the person yer friends would have ye be?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_032カラスって奴が、どういう思いだったのか知らねぇが、
貰えるもんは貰っといて、もっと頑張りゃいい話だろ……？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_033<tab>Thank you, Captain Jacke. I must admit, I had never thought of it that way.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_033…………なるほど。
ありがとう、少し心が軽くなった気がする。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TSUBAME_000_034<tab>Oboro! I...I...forgive me, I have readied the falcon as you requested. Shall we pay Master Kamui a visit?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TSUBAME_000_034オ、オボロ様、ここにいましたか。
「大隼」の用意ができましたので、最長老に会いにゆきましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_035<tab>Allow me to explain, my friends. Since returning here, I have been researching the history of our village─in particular, the life of our forefather, Master Sasuke─in hopes of better understanding our foe and the grudge he bears.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_035実はハンゾウの言っていた、忍びの里の開祖「サスケ」が、
抜け忍だということが気になっていてな。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_036<tab>The tales say that Master Sasuke came to Doma on a mission so secret, no records of it were ever left. Our elders, too, were at a loss. If any possess knowledge of such ancient happenings, they said, it would be the old hermit.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_036サスケは密命で、このドマの地に来たとされているが、
里の長老ですら、その真相が詳しくはわからぬようだ。
そこで、最長老の「カムイ」様に訪ねてみることにしたのだ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_037<tab>That is what we call Master Kamui, an elder who retired from his post long ago, and now spends his days in meditation at Plum Spring, pondering the meaning of existence to depths ordinary minds can scarce comprehend.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_037カムイ様はとうに引退され、里を出て「梅泉郷」という、
人里離れたところで、隠遁生活をされている。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_038<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As my student, you too are an heir to Master Sasuke's legacy. I would ask that you accompany me to Plum Spring, that together we may learn the truth about the father of our art. Will you do this?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_038)) (( )) 02 /var>も、自分の忍術の起源である、
「サスケ」の謎を知るため、ともに来ぬか？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_039<tab>Excellent. Plum Spring is not far from here, but we cannot travel there on land. Tsubame was kind enough to summon the falconer. Let us return to Namai.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_039よし、梅泉郷は空を飛ぶことでしか行けぬ場所にあるので、
忍びの里から「大隼」を手配してある。
「ナマイ村」へと向かおう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_040<tab>I'm no shinobi, an' I wouldn't know this Sasuke from a hole in the ground, but I'm comin' with ye─if for no other reason than I'm dyin' for a change o' scenery.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_040もちろん、俺も行くぜ。
なんせ、あの村は田んぼしかなくて退屈なもんでね……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_041<tab>Ye reckon ridin' one o' these things is much like ridin' a chocobo?
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_041大隼に乗るのは初めてだ。
チョコボに比べて乗りにくそうだが……大丈夫なのか？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TSUBAME_000_042<tab>It is said that the old hermit's mastery of ninjutsu is so complete that he requires no food and no sleep, and has conquered death himself. Mind you, it is <var 1A 02 /var>also<var 1A 01 /var> said that the source of these claims is Master Kamui himself.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TSUBAME_000_042カムイ様は忍術を極め、不老不死を得たとされています。
もっとも……自称なので、真偽のほどはわかりませんが。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_WARP02951_000_043<tab>I am a falconer in service to the village. It is my honor to serve.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_WARP02951_000_043<tab>どうも、忍びの里から参りました、大隼使いの者です。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_044<tab>Master Kamui rarely accepts visitors, but the elders have assured me he awaits our arrival. Do not ask me why, but they say he is particularly interested in seeing you, Tsubame.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_044俗世を捨てたカムイ様は、普段は隠れておられるのだが、
我ら里の者が向かえば、その姿を現してくださる。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_045<tab>In any event, Plum Spring is but a short and pleasant flight away. When you are ready to depart, pray speak to the falconer over there.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_045もし、お主が「梅泉郷」から出てしまったときは、
「大隼使いの男」に声をかけて、また来てくれ。
さあ、それでは梅泉郷へと向かうとしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_046<tab>It's pretty an' all, but what's a cove to do for fun in these parts?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_046<tab>こんなところにいて、退屈しねぇのかな……？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TSUBAME_000_047<tab>It is beautiful, is it not? They say that the plum blossoms have been in bloom here since before the dawn of time...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TSUBAME_000_047いつ来ても、美しい……。
ここは、常に梅の花が満開なんですよ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_048<tab>My aching back...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_048<tab>アイタタタ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_WARP02951_000_049<tab>Do not be afraid, friend. My loyal bird will carry you safe and sure to your destination.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_WARP02951_000_049<tab>大隼に乗れば、「梅泉郷」までひとっ飛びですよ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SYSTEM_100_049<tab>Ride the falcon to Plum Spring?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SYSTEM_100_049<tab>「梅泉郷」へ行きますか？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SYSTEM_200_049<tab>Return to Namai?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_SYSTEM_200_049<tab>「ナマイ村」へ戻りますか？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_050<tab>This is the esteemed Master Kamui. I can scarcely wait to hear what words of enlightenment he would share with us.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_050こちらのご老人が、カムイ様だ。
さっそく、「サスケ」のことを聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_051<tab>A thousand apologies for the intrusion, Master Kamui. It is I, Oboro. I have come seeking knowledge of Master Sasuke and the founding of our village. If it would not be an imposition, pray share with us your great wisdom.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_051カムイ様、ご無沙汰しております、オボロにございます。
今日は忍びの里の開祖「サスケ」の密命について、
お聞きしたいことがあり、お邪魔しました。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_052<tab>Obo-who? I don't know any Obo─aiya! My back! Every word I speak is a dagger in me!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_052オボロ……はて、誰じゃったかのう？
アイタタタ……今日は腰が痛くて、話すのも億劫じゃ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_053<tab>No, no, this won't do at all. I'll be needing my medicine─the usual, that is. Liver of a Yanxian tiger, horn of a rhino beetle, claw of a Doman weasel! Yes, that always does the trick.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_053こういうときは、生薬に限る。
ヤンサトラの肝と、サイカブトの角、そして。
それらを煎じたものを飲めば、きっとよくなるじゃろう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_054<tab>Yes, I simply cannot carry on a conversation in such pain. So be on your way, boys. You stay here, my little swallow, and keep an old man company.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_054話を聞きたければ、まずはその三つを持ってこい……。
ああ、ツバメちゃんはここに残って、
ワシの話し相手になってくれればいいぞい。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_055<tab>For every whid bein' a dagger in him, he sure likes his prattlin'.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_055<tab>おい、爺さん、話すのも億劫なんじゃなかったか……？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_056<tab>Oboro... Oboro... Where have I heard that name before?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_056<tab>オボロ……そういえば思い出したぞ……

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_057<tab>Enlightenment, my arse! This old coot's a real piece o' work...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_057って……無視かよ！
今度は、面倒な爺さんときたか……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_058<tab>Oboro... Ah yes, the dim little boy who could never quite match the wits and skills of his friend Karasu...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_058幼い頃から、天才のカラスに追いつこうと、
必死になっていた、あのオボロか……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_059<tab>Y-Yes...that is I. It is my honor to bring you the medicine you seek, Master.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_059……そう、そのオボロです。
承知しました、それでは、お望みの物を集めてきます。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_060<tab>Forgive me, friend, but it seems we have little choice but to indulge the master. Between the three of us, hopefully it will not prove too trying a task. Let us return to Namai.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_060すまぬが、カムイ様の望みの物を手分けして集めてくれないか？
ひとまず、ナマイ村に戻ろう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_065<tab>I've half a mind to <var 1A 02 /var>enlighten<var 1A 01 /var> the old coot with a click in the muns.
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_065<tab>まったく、面倒くさい爺さんだな……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TSUBAME_000_066<tab><giggle> Master Kamui, you forget yourself...!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_TSUBAME_000_066<tab>ウフフ……カムイ様、御冗談を～。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_067<tab>Come now, my little swallow. It's the only path to true enlightenment!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_067<tab>ツバメちゃん、ワシの嫁にならんか……？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_070<tab><sigh> Playing errand boy for Master Kamui...what a splendid turn of events. In any event, let us split up and make short work of this. I will hunt down a Yanxian tiger. Captain Jacke, pray see to the rhino beetle horn.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_070私は、ヤンサトラの肝を獲ってこよう。
ジャック殿には、サイカブトの角を頼む。
)) (( )) 02 /var>には、「」を頼みたい。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_071<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I would entrust the Doman weasel claw to you. My apologies for troubling you with such a menial task, but I fear Master Kamui is nothing if not stubborn. In any event, let us return here when we have found what he seeks.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_071こんなことまでさせて、申し訳ないが、
カムイ様は、気分屋なので従うほかないのだ。
それでは、またここに集合しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_075<tab>To think I sailed clear across the Ruby Sea to go bug huntin'...
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_075<tab>こんなところで、虫取りするはめになるとはな……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_080<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I trust you were able to procure a weasel claw?
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_080<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DCE01 /var>」は獲ってきてくれたか？

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_081<tab>Thank you, friend. I am pleased to report that Captain Jacke and I were also successful in our hunts. Let us return to Plum Spring and hope that Master Kamui is feeling more talkative.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_081かたじけない……ヤンサトラの肝はもう獲ってきたぞ。
ジャック殿から、サイカブトの角も受け取っている。
それでは、「梅泉郷」へと向かおう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_082<tab>If it's all the same to ye lads, I'll be stayin' here, thank ye kindly. I'm like as not to give that ol' coot a clout in the nob, an' I reckon yer elders wouldn't take kindly to that.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_082俺はここで待っとくぜ。
あの爺さんは、もうこりごりだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_085<tab>What I wouldn't give for a pint an' a rum doxy at me side!
target: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_085<tab>ああ、やっぱり退屈だな……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_090<tab>Is it just me, or does Master Kamui seem rather...spry...given his condition? No matter, let us give the man what he asked for.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_090カムイ様、随分と……お元気そうだが……。
まあいい、お望みの品を渡すことにしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_091<tab>Ohohoho! My favorite medicine─never fails to put a spring in an old man's step.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_091ホッホッホ、やっぱり生薬じゃのう。
おかげで、腰の痛みが嘘のように消えたぞい！

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_092<tab>But, Master Kamui, we have not begun to boil the─forgive me. What I mean to say is, it warms my heart to see you well.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_092ま、まだ飲むどころか、煎じてすらいないようですが……
それは何よりでした。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_093<tab><cough> Ahem! So it was Sasuke's secret mission you wished to hear of, my boy? Let me see what I remember. It was oh, oh so long ago...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_093ウォッホン……。
さて、サスケの密命について聞きたいのじゃったな……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_094<tab>Once upon a time in Hingashi, in the time they called the Age of Strife, there lived a man named Hanzo─Hanzo the first. Leader of the Kagekakushi clan, he crafted a summoning mudra of terrifying power.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_094遥か昔……ひんがしの国が戦国時代の頃、影隠の里の長である、
初代ハンゾウは、強力な「口寄せの術」を編み出した。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_095<tab>Many a warlord did covet this power, that they might wield it to unify the warring states under their rule. Hanzo would hear nothing of it─time and again, he turned down prestigious posts and untold riches, declaring that the mudra would be used only in defense. He recorded his knowledge on a single scroll, and sealed it away far from the eyes of man.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_095だが、国盗りのために用いることはせず、
己の里を守るためにのみ、使うことと決めた。
そして、その術は一巻の巻物へと封印された……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_096<tab>Some time later, a vagabond came to Kagekakushi. After the villagers nursed him back to health, he explained that he had fled across the sea from the land of Doma to escape the reign of a tyrant.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_096しばらくして、影隠の里の者が海辺で漂流者を発見する。
介抱してやると、どうやら圧政者に耐えかねて、
海を越えて逃げてきたドマの民であった。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_097<tab>So it was that Hanzo the First─moved deeply by the traveler's story─called upon Sasuke, his most trusted protégé, to carry the forbidden knowledge across the Ruby Sea and bring freedom to the people of Doma.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_097そこで、初代ハンゾウは若手筆頭格の「サスケ」に、
「口寄せの術」を封じた巻物を託し、海を渡らせた。
ドマの民の力になってやるようにとな。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_098<tab>Sasuke wielded the power but once, such was its power. In a matter of moments, the tyrant's army crumbled before its might, and the Doman people at last knew freedom.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_098結果、サスケは一度だけ「口寄せの術」を使った。
その強力な力で、たちまち圧政者を倒して、
ドマに平和をもたらしたのじゃ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_099<tab>But Sasuke felt that his job was not yet done. He resolved to remain in Doma, and established a village here, that he might train his new countrymen to carry on his legacy, and pass down the art of ninjutsu to future generations. <var 1A 02 /var>That<var 1A 01 /var> is the untold story of our village's origins.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_099それから、サスケはドマで忍びの里を開き、
その術を「禁忌口寄せの術」として、禁ずることにした。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_100<tab>As for the forbidden mudra by whose power Doma's freedom was won, who can say why our ancestor feared it so. All that we know is that he was not content to merely seal the scroll away, but took his blade in hand and sliced it clean in two.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_100サスケは、よっぽど「禁忌口寄せの術」に危険を感じたのか、
巻物を厳重に保管するだけでは、飽き足らなかった。
そのため、巻物は二巻に分割されることとなった。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_101<tab>One piece was presented as an offering to the King of Doma, in celebration of the nation's newfound freedom. The other he sealed away in his village─our village─never again to see the light of day.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_101そして、ひとつは、主君と定めたドマの国主一族に献上され、
もうひとつは、忍びの里に隠されたのじゃ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_102<tab>I suspected as much. Master Sasuke was no traitor or deserter, but a shinobi of honor.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_102……そうだったのか。
やはり……サスケは抜け忍ではなかったのですね。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_103<tab>Even at the time, it is said that Hanzo the First told none other of Sasuke's true mission. Though unfortunate, it is little surprise that today, centuries later, his descendants see Sasuke as little more than a traitor who stole away with their greatest treasure and fled to a foreign land...
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_103おそらく、サスケの密命は影隠の里でも、
ごく限られた者しか、知るところではなかったのじゃろう。
それが長き時を経て、いつしか間違って伝わったに違いない……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_104<tab>Thank you, Master Kamui. This has proved more enlightening beyond my wildest hopes.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_104カムイ様、貴重なお話、
どうも、ありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_105<tab>Glad to hear it, boy─but don't think I'll take kindly to you interrupting my blissful enlightenment again. As for you, my little swallow, you're welcome to come back any time.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_KAMUI_000_105ホッホッホ、もう来るなよ。
ワシの平穏なる余生を妨げんでほしいわい……。
ああ、ツバメちゃんだけは、またいつでも来るといいぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_106<tab>Sorry to interrupt yer lecherous prittle prattle, but the princess here's got news to share─an' I'm afraid it ain't of the good variety.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_106お姫様がやって来て、急いで伝えたいことがあるというもんで、
村の大隼を借りて来ちまったぜ。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_YUKI_000_107<tab>Oboro, we must move quickly! Our men afield have reported that the Kagekakushi clan musters their forces in full, and means to march on Doma!
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_YUKI_000_107影隠一族が、ドマへと向かう準備をし始めたんだよ！
きっと、巻物の不足に気付いたんだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_108<tab>...No doubt Hanzo has figured out where the other half of the scroll lies. There is no time to lose. We must return at once and prepare to defend the village.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_108やはり、そうきたか……。
攻め込んでくるものは、迎え撃つしかない。
さあ、村へ戻ることにしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_110<tab>This Hanzo cove doesn't waste any time, does he? Seems our job's simple enough─we need to grabble his half of the scroll before he gets his daddles on ours.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_JACKE_000_110ついに、来やがるか。
ハンゾウから、あの巻物を取り返さなくちゃな……。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_120<tab>Tsubame has gone to deliver the news to the elders. Meanwhile, Princess Yuki makes for the Ruby Sea to look out for the Kagekakushi army's approach.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_120ツバメは、忍びの里へと報せに行った。
ユキ姫は、影隠一族の進軍を監視できるよう、
紅玉海の方へと向かってくれた。

source: TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_121<tab>We know not the size of our foe's army, nor their strength─only that both are formidable, and then some. Suffice it to say we will be tested as never before. In what time we have, I implore you to devote yourself to your training as if our very lives depended on it─for surely they do.
target:
TEXT_JOBNIN680_02951_OBORO_000_121敵はひんがしの国の忍びたち……戦力は未知数だ。
奴らが進軍してきたときは、またお主の力を貸してほしい。
